data.title: Home
data.meta_description: RATP Dev operates and maintains transportation systems on 4 continents, in order to make distances shorter, boost regional economies and bring people together
data.text:
Success stories

See our operations

America, Europe, Africa, Middle East, Asia/Oceania: RATP Dev is present in 15 countries* where our +100 subsidairies operate and maintain innovative and safe transport systems.

Browse the map to

see our references

* And in 4 addtional countries through franchises.
